sentences.english: Putting it bluntly , this is dream talk.
sentences.chinese: 老實說罷，這是自欺欺人的夢話。

sentences.english: Sigh, First I will get the Professor back then talk about it.
sentences.chinese: 唉等我先把老夫子取出來再說罷。

sentences.english: As they finished breakfast, Dorothy dropped her bombshell .
sentences.chinese: 喫罷早飯，多蘿西投下了她的重磅炸彈。

sentences.english: I have come to this world trark naked, and in the twinkling of an eye, I am to go back as stark naked as ever.
sentences.chinese: 我赤裸裸來到這世界，轉眼間也將赤裸裸的回去罷？

sentences.english: Go now, but the men only, and serve Jehovah, since that is what you are requesting.
sentences.chinese: 你們壯年人去事奉耶和華罷，因爲這是你們所求的。

sentences.english: When the new plant is built, I am sure that I will go visiting it.
sentences.chinese: 我想，等新的成量修起來，我還是會去看看罷。

sentences.english: The policeman came up to me, and said, "Get another rickshaw. He can't pull you any more."
sentences.chinese: 巡警走近我說，“你自己僱車罷，他不能拉你了。”

sentences.english: Was. I was rescued by a scrap-metal merchant, imagine that.
sentences.chinese: 我被一收廢金屬的救下了，想象那個罷。

sentences.english: He day Hulu, beloved strike expedition.
sentences.chinese: 何日平胡虜，良人罷遠征。

sentences.english: I'd say she is a concubine's daughter.
sentences.chinese: 我猜是小老婆的女兒罷。

sentences.english: Love is kind of let people try to stop but cannot habit.
sentences.chinese: 深愛是種讓人慾罷不能的習慣。

sentences.english: The policeman came up to me and said, "Get another rickshaw. He can't take you any further."
sentences.chinese: 巡警走近我說，“你自己僱車罷，他不能拉你了。”

sentences.english: "O dinna ye mind, young man, " said she.
Long-en temple tour stop after next floor, you can treasure the city.
sentences.chinese: 參觀罷隆恩殿，經過明樓，即可珍寶城。

sentences.english: He remained at his post when the workers went on strike.
sentences.chinese: 工人罷工時他堅守崗位。
